titleStmt.title: The soules ingrafting into Christ. By T.H.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, Thomas, 1586-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] H[aviland] for Andrew Crooke, at the signe of the Beare in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The title page in largely in the same setting as the sub title page of STC 13739.
Text differs from that of the longer treatise of the same title included in his "The soules implantation".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Beare in Pauls Church-yard
